_sText:
This map is based in a small village, and there are 32 spawns and 2 bombsites.

I have worked abnout 2 months on this so far, Ive been really working on optimization, and extra detail.

I am looking for suggestions on what I can add to the map, or what should be fixed, etc.

Would this map look good with hdr? different textures? different lighting?

THis is only the first beta and there may be some major changes to come.

Please leave feedback, seeing as that is the reason I have posted it ^^

There is also one secret area in the map, but you will have to find it :D
